title: Until Dawn Remake Developer Reportedly Shut Down
description: Until Dawn remake development studio Ballistic Moon has reportedly shut down, marking an end to support for the 2024 horror game.
author: Matthew Schomer

title: Roblox Players Have Chance to Win $1 Million
description: Roblox announces the biggest global competition in its history, with a $1,000,000 cash grand prize waiting for one lucky winner.
author: Mohsen Baqery

title: GTA 5 Enhanced Edition on PC is Missing a Feature
description: Grand Theft Auto 5 Enhanced on PC is missing an important feature from the game's original release, and fans aren't happy about it.
author: Raul Landaverde

title: Call of Duty Announces Black Ops 6 and Warzone Season 3 Has Been Delayed
description: Call of Duty publisher Activision announces a substantial delay to Black Ops 6 and Warzone's Season 3 content update.
author: Kyle Knight

title: World of Warcraft Reveals The War Within Patch 11.1.5
description: Just over a week after the launch of Patch 11.1, World of Warcraft surprises players with a first look at what is coming next in The War Within.
author: Eric Law
